name: Ghost of Space
description:
A simple 3D Space Shooter Game. Shoot glowing asteroids in space while avoiding being hit. Your survival depends on your piloting skills.

A 3D Space Shooter Game made with Unreal Engine 5. Global Illumination is Lumen to allow natural, realistic and accurate scene lighting. Uses Niagara System for particles to create an impactful explosion effects. Uses the latest Meta Sound System to capture accurate 3D stereo audio for more immersive game.

Want to make a game with this template? Contact me!
